name: Gangpsules
description:
You are the blue guy. The yellow guy is your friend. The red guys are enemies.

You can play the story mode or try to see how long you can last on arcade mode.

You can access the story mode from the front door of the hub and the arcade mode from the tv on the top left side of the hub.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Space - Jump

Q - Change Weapon Hand

Left Click - Fire (or stab with a knife if you don't have a gun)
